title: This video could prove that Nicki Minaj is already married
text:
This video could prove that Nicki Minaj is already married

Cape Town - Rapper Nicki Minaj has hinted that she is already married to her boyfriend executive producer Kenneth Petty.

Taking to her Instagram page, the 36-year-old shared a video of matching "Mr. and Mrs" mugs and coordinating "Bride" and "Groom" baseball caps.

"Onika Tanya Maraj-Petty 10•21•19," she captioned the video

She hasn't shared any more details about tying the knot, but Nicki revealed earlier in the year that she would have a big wedding celebration following their low-key nuptials.

In previous tweets, the Super Bass hitmaker wrote that she’s retiring from music and she will be focusing on family.

READ MORE: Rapper Nicki Minaj announces retirement

"I've decided to retire & have my family," tweeted the successful rapper.

"I know you guys are happy now," she continued. "To my fans, keep reppin me, do it til da death of me, X in the box - cuz ain't nobody checkin me."

CHECK OUT HER VIDEO HERE:
description: Rapper Nicki Minaj has hinted that she is already married to her boyfriend executive producer Kenneth Petty.
